modName: All in One Gameplay Settings Mod
summary: Changes several aspect of default gameplay settings
descriptionHtml:
As I have created a setting for my second playthrough of Skyrim I have changed several default gameplay settings.
Instead of having loads of different mods do small changes I have created one mod that do them all and this is the resulting mod.

What this mod will do is the following:

- Reduce Stamina taxation from stamina based actions
- Trainer only charge minimal gold for any level and you can train 100 times pr level
- Lockpicking is a lot easier and all locks are novice (except those that req key)
- Sneaking is a lot easier
- During combat, stamina and magicka regenerate faster
- Jump twice as high
- Max armor rating can reach 99 percent instead of default 80 percent
- Max resistance can reach 99 percent instead of default 85 percent
- Pickpocket chance can reach 99 percent instead of default 90 percent
- Slightly faster to reach third word during shout

The included readme in the downloaded file contain details of what properties have been changed from what values.

Update:
A harder version have been uploaded, making all slightly harder instead of the other way around :)

Other mods by Me:
